title: New: Ophelia – Not So Frightening
content:
Image: Stephen Hart

With the rise of Lorde and Flume leading the way for Australasia, it’s almost undoubtable that intelligent, electro-pop music is thriving in the area.

Ophelia, a duo comprised of producer Patrick Shanahan and singer Alex Louise are vying to add their name to this list of soon to be worldwide stars. Their debut single Not So Frightening is an intense vaguely Purity Ring meets Ellie Goulding style jam, that’s dark in lyrical content yet upbeat and accesible in sound. Amidst the shouts of ‘hey’, heavy synths lines and a piano riff ripped straight from a horror flick, there lies ones of the most intriguing compositions of recent times. Check out Not So Frightening below, and keep up with Ophelia via Facebook.
